name: Introduction to Programming
description: Fundamentals of programming concepts using Python. Covers variables, control structures, functions, and basic data structures.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Advanced data structures including trees, graphs, and hash tables. Algorithm design and analysis techniques.

name: Circuit Analysis
description: Principles of electrical circuit analysis, Kirchhoff's laws, nodal and mesh analysis, and circuit theorems.

name: Software Engineering Principles
description: Software development lifecycle, design patterns, software testing, and project management methodologies.

name: Thermodynamics
description: Laws of thermodynamics, energy transfer, and applications in mechanical engineering systems.

name: Advanced Database Systems
description: Advanced topics in database management systems, including distributed databases, NoSQL, and data warehousing.

name: Chemical Process Safety
description: Analysis and design of safe chemical processes, hazard identification, risk assessment, and safety management.

name: Structural Analysis
description: Analysis of statically determinate and indeterminate structures, influence lines, and structural design principles.

name: Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: Basic concepts in machine learning, supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms, and model evaluation.

name: Quality Control Systems
description: Statistical quality control, process capability analysis, acceptance sampling, and quality management principles.
